node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `bug` ( `bug_id` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `bugnum` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `assignedto_user` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `subsystem` varchar(64) NOT NULL default 'UNASSIGNED', `status` varchar(32) NOT NULL default 'NEW', `severity` varchar(64) NOT NULL default 'UNASSIGNED', `priority` varchar(64) NOT NULL default 'UNASSIGNED', `summary` varchar(128) NOT NULL default '', `description` text NOT NULL, `disposition` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bugnum`), KEY `bug_id` (`bug_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=288 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1
node.title: bug
